Parent/Family Reporting of Harassment, Intimidation, Bullying

span.style: font-size: 11pt; text-decoration: underline; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

strong.span: ATTENTION FDS FAMILIES: STUDENT BREAKFAST & LUNCH AVAILABLE FOR PICK-UP M-F from 11:30 a.m. to 1 p.m. at Foresthill High School.

p.span: UPDATE 4/17/2020: Breakfast and Lunch- Due to continued efforts to do our part in keeping students, families, staff, community, and vulnerable residents healthy and safe from the spread of COVID-19 (C19), the meal program has been consolidated with Foresthill High School (FHS). Starting on Monday, April 20, 2020, all “Grab and Go” meals from both programs (FDS and FHS) can be picked up daily from 11:30 a.m. – 1:00 p.m.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; text-decoration: underline; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: Foresthill Divide School will not be open on Friday 4/10/2020 for "Grab and Go" meals. Please know that on Thursday 4/9/2020 staff will be proving your student with two of the "Grab and Go" meals if requested. This will be for Thursday and Friday. We hope you all are enjoying your spring break.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; text-decoration: underline; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
span.br: The Foresthill Union School District participates in the National School Lunch Program and School Breakfast Program by offering nutritious meals every school day. Students may buy lunch for $3.00 and breakfast for $1.50. Eligible students may receive meals free of charge or at the reduced-price rate of $0.40 for lunch and $0.30 for breakfast. You or your children do not have to be U.S. citizens to qualify for free or reduced-price meals. If there are more household members than the number of lines on the application, attach a second application.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: Applications are also available at the school or district offices.

span.a: 2019-20 Application/Letter to Household for Free & Reduced-Price Meals

div.div: 22888 Foresthill Road, Foresthill, CA 95631 | Phone (530) 367-2966 | Fax (530) 367-4526
